name: Faktr - Prime
description:
Protect your home base in this fast-paced arcade-style game. Take control of a ship and use your factoring skills to break down asteroids.

"The process of factoring becomes completely intuitive after one playthrough, and that makes it a huge learning success. Plus, it's just plain fun!" - Common Sense Education

Unlock upgrades like more health, faster speed, and the time-slowing infinity drive.
Divide to conquer. Dodge, attack or make a calculated risk.

Each level finishes off with a boss fight! You'll need strategy and quick reactions. Frenzied Factoring - divide enemies down to their primes!
